short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters out keywords from the FA front page to hide reminder spam

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension filters out submissions from the front page of Fur Affinity. By default, it only blocks the word "reminder", but you can configure other keywords as well.
